suppress.notes:
file name: wicket-core-9.18.0.jar: jquery-2.2.4.min.js
This is a dependency version mismatch. We use jquery 3.6 that is not affected by vulnerability.

file name: wicket-core-9.18.0.jar: jquery-2.2.4.js
This is a dependency version mismatch. We use jquery 3.6 that is not affected by vulnerability.

file name: wicket-core-9.18.0.jar: jquery-1.12.4.min.js
This is a dependency version mismatch. We use jquery 3.6 that is not affected by vulnerability.

file name: wicket-core-9.18.0.jar: jquery-1.12.4.js
This is a dependency version mismatch. We use jquery 3.6 that is not affected by vulnerability.

file name: bootstrap-5.3.2.jar
we don't use bootstrap carousel component on Igloo

file name: bootstrap-5.3.2.jar
same than CVE-2024-6484 : we don't use bootstrap carousel component on Igloo

file name: bootstrap4-4.6.0.jar: bootstrap.bundle.js
same than CVE-2024-6484 : we don't use bootstrap carousel component on Igloo

file name: bootstrap4-4.6.0.jar: bootstrap.bundle.min.js
same than CVE-2024-6484 : we don't use bootstrap carousel component on Igloo
file name: bootstrap4-4.6.0.jar: bootstrap.js

file name: bootstrap4-4.6.0.jar: bootstrap.min.js
same than CVE-2024-6484 : we don't use bootstrap carousel component on Igloo

file name: wiquery-jquery-ui-9.0.0.jar: jquery-ui.js
We do not include jquery-ui radiobox in our codebose. Only jquery-ui datepicker is included.

file name: select2-bootstrap-5-theme-1.3.0.jar
We use select2 4.0.13 ; issues relates to select2 <= 4.0.5.

file name: jackson-databind-2.14.1.jar
This vulnerability is a DOS when serializing cyclic objects. It is not reachable by external attackers.

file name: spring-security-crypto-5.8.0.jar
This is a dependency verison mismatch. Only spring-security < 5.3.3 is affected.
Encryptors.queryableText is not used.

file name: spring-web-5.3.24.jar
This vulnerability implies httpinvoker usage. We do not use httpinvoker.

file name: wicket-core-9.12.0.jar: jquery-1.12.4.js
This is a dependency version mismatch. We use jquery 3.6 that is not affected by vulnerability.

This is a dependency version mismatch. We use jquery 3.6 that is not affected by vulnerability.

This is a dependency version mismatch. We use jquery 3.6 that is not affected by vulnerability.

This is a dependency version mismatch. We use jquery 3.6 that is not affected by vulnerability.

file name: wicket-core-9.12.0.jar: jquery-1.12.4.js
This is a dependency version mismatch. We use jquery 3.6 that is not affected by vulnerability.
suppress.vulnerabilityName: jQuery 1.x and 2.x are End-of-Life and no longer receiving security updates

suppress.notes:
file name: lucene-core-5.5.5.jar
Igloo don't use LuceneReplicator. If we have to, we would not use it on arbitrary data but on our data. Lucene 9.12.0 is not compatible with hibernate search 5

file name: querydsl-jpa-5.1.0.jar
Igloo 5 don't use QueryDSL with orderBy parameter in URL

file name: spring-core-5.3.39.jar
Igloo don't use byte[] parameter in spring-webmvc

file name: spring-core-5.3.39.jar
Igloo 5 don't use disallowedFields patterns in DataBinder

file name: spring-security-crypto-5.8.16.jar
Igloo check that password size is less than 72 bytes

file name: spring-webmvc-5.3.39.jar
Igloo applications runs on Tomcat
